attributes.action: Save 15 million bees from being burned! Humanity survival depends on bees.
attributes.additional_details:
Please save the 15 million bee babies that are going to be burned due to Brexit rules. Whole planet depends on bees,they are our little saviours. I’m past years population of bees decreased drastically. Now due to new rules 15! million humanity savers are destined for extinction! This is unacceptable!
Only Government or Parliament can stop this unnecessary extinction of humanity savers!
attributes.background: Change the Brexit rules on bee and other animals transportation to stop unnecessary extinctions. Save 15 million bees from being burned.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573228

The Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs has published a blog about bee importation, which responds to reports that 15 million bees will be killed because they can't be imported. You can read this here: https://deframedia.blog.gov.uk/2021/02/08/bee-importation/
